Label: Polar Plasma Wave Instrument, High Frequency Waveform Receiver, 2 kHz (6-channel, ~0.0002 sec resolution) fields - D. Gurnett (U. Iowa)

VariableDescription.Name: DATA_QUALITY
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           POLAR PWI HFWR2K
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     POLAR>Polar Plasma Laboratory
#     DATA_TYPE                       H4>HFWR 2kHz
#     DESCRIPTOR                      PWI>Plasma Wave Instrument
#     DATA_VERSION                    1
#     TEXT                            Reference:..Gurnett, D.A. et al, The Polar plasma wave instrument, Space Science                       
#                                      Reviews, Vol. 71, pp. 597-622, 1995.  donald-gurnett@.uiowa.edu                                       
#                                     An FFT on 2048 values was used in calibrating the data; i.e., perform FFT, calibrate                   
#                                      in frequency domain, perform inverse FFT to get calibrated time series.                               
#                                     Data are lowpass filtered so that the data are valid only up to 2 kHz.
#                                     The three orthogonal magnetic field components are given in units of nT/Sec                            
#                                      rather than nT because the response of the searchcoils across the passband                            
#                                      is not flat.  In order to obtain units of nT, the data would need to be digitally                     
#                                      filtered to the frequency of interest and then integrated over time.  Integrating                     
#                                      over the entire passband could possibly destroy the resolution of the higher                          
#                                      frequency components since the low frequency noise, if present, will dominate.                        
#                                     Effective Bandwidth is 1.5*delta_f, where delta_f depends on the size of the                           
#                                      FFT used to convert to the frequency domain, and delta_t.                                             
#     MODS                            Created Oct 1999
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0171
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 PO_H4_PWI_00000000_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  PO_H4_PWI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Polar Plasma Wave Instrument, High Frequency Waveform Receiver, 2 kHz (6-channel,                      
#                                      ~0.0002 sec resolution) fields                                                                        
#     PI_NAME                         D. Gurnett
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Polar
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Radio and Plasma Waves (space)
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 See VAR_NOTES for Delta_T, below
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www-pw.physics.uiowa.edu/plasma-wave/istp.polar/homp.html
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Polar_PWI_highfreq_2khz_h4_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, time of HFWR 2 kHz value
#  2. DATA_QUALITY 0 = OK, 1 = poor
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 22:24:14 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. DATA_QUALITY 0 = OK, 1 = poor
#
EPOCH                   DATA_QUALITY
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms              
26-03-1996 23:02:19.124            0

#                                      in frequency domain, perform inverse FFT to get calibrated time series.                               
#                                     Data are lowpass filtered so that the data are valid only up to 2 kHz.
#                                     The three orthogonal magnetic field components are given in units of nT/Sec                            
#                                      rather than nT because the response of the searchcoils across the passband                            
#                                      is not flat.  In order to obtain units of nT, the data would need to be digitally                     
#                                      filtered to the frequency of interest and then integrated over time.  Integrating                     
#                                      over the entire passband could possibly destroy the resolution of the higher                          
#                                      frequency components since the low frequency noise, if present, will dominate.                        
#                                     Effective Bandwidth is 1.5*delta_f, where delta_f depends on the size of the                           
#                                      FFT used to convert to the frequency domain, and delta_t.                                             
#     MODS                            Created Oct 1999
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0171
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 PO_H4_PWI_00000000_V01
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  PO_H4_PWI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Polar Plasma Wave Instrument, High Frequency Waveform Receiver, 2 kHz (6-channel,                      
#                                      ~0.0002 sec resolution) fields                                                                        
#     PI_NAME                         D. Gurnett
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Polar
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Radio and Plasma Waves (space)
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 See VAR_NOTES for Delta_T, below
#     HTTP_LINK                       http://www-pw.physics.uiowa.edu/plasma-wave/istp.polar/homp.html
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Polar_PWI_highfreq_2khz_h4_cdf
#
#

# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 22:24:18 2015
